entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
